Name: Axan Ships
About the game: Campaign Free galaxy mode with spaceships Free top-down mode Galaxy mode: Combat System Shield points. Shields get dented on impact No health points but statuses of a ship Two types of rockets Two types of lasers Permadeath Galaxy Mode: Module System New modules are procedurally developed Modules get broken during battles Modules get old and less reliable Top-Down Mode scripted top-down missions Axan Ships - Low Poly is fully functional, free version of Axan Ships
